title: OFSS Bihar 11th Intermediate Admission 2025-27 – Re-Open
organization: Online Facilitation System for Students (OFSS), Bihar
overview: Spot admission for Class 11th in Bihar government and private colleges for academic session 2025-27.
eligibility: Passed Class 10th examination from recognized board (BSEB, ICSE, CBSE or equivalent)
Minimum required percentage as per college norms
Bihar domicile certificate required

applicationProcess.title: Registration
applicationProcess.description: Visit OFSS portal and register with personal details

applicationProcess.title: College Selection
applicationProcess.description: Choose preferred colleges and streams

applicationProcess.title: Document Upload
applicationProcess.description: Upload required documents including marksheet and domicile certificate

applicationProcess.title: Final Submission
applicationProcess.description: Submit the application and take printout for reference

selectionProcess: Merit list based on Class 10th marks
Direct admission at college after merit approval

courseDetails.structure: Science, Commerce, and Arts streams available

contact.address: Bihar Education Project Council, Patna, Bihar

title: Bihar ITI CAT 2025 Offline Mop-Up Counselling – Date Extended
university: Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (BCECEB)
fees: ₹750 for General/OBC/EWS, ₹100 for SC/ST, ₹430 for PH
overview: Mop-up counselling for ITI courses in government and private ITIs across Bihar.
eligibility: Passed or appearing in Class 10th or equivalent examination
Minimum 35% marks in qualifying exam
Age as per BCECEB rules

importantDates.label: Last Date for Registration & Choice Filling

applicationProcess.title: Offline/Online Registration
applicationProcess.description: Register on BCECEB counselling portal or at designated centres

applicationProcess.title: Choice Filling
applicationProcess.description: Select preferred ITIs and trades

applicationProcess.title: Document Verification
applicationProcess.description: Get documents verified at counselling centre

applicationProcess.title: Fee Payment
applicationProcess.description: Pay admission fee at ITI or online as per instructions

selectionProcess: Reservation as per Bihar government norms

contact.address: BCECEB, I.A.S. Association Building, Near Patna Airport, Patna

title: BCECE Online Mop-up Counselling 2025
university: Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board
overview: Mop-up counselling for engineering, medical, pharmacy, and agriculture courses in Bihar colleges.
eligibility: Passed or appearing in 10+2 with required subjects
Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology for Pharmacy/Medical/Engineering
Minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved categories)

applicationProcess.title: Online Registration
applicationProcess.description: Register on BCECEB counselling portal

applicationProcess.title: Choice Filling
applicationProcess.description: Select preferred colleges and courses

applicationProcess.title: Seat Allotment
applicationProcess.description: Check allotment result online

applicationProcess.title: Admission Confirmation
applicationProcess.description: Report to allotted college with documents

contact.address: BCECEB, I.A.S. Association Building, Near Patna Airport, Patna

title: IIT GATE 2026 Admission Online Form – Start
fees: Phase I: ₹2,000 for General/OBC, ₹1,000 for SC/ST/PWD/Female; Phase II: ₹2,500 for General/OBC, ₹1,500 for SC/ST/PWD/Female
overview: Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering for admission to M.Tech programs in IITs, NITs, and other institutes.
eligibility: Passed/appearing BE/B.Tech/B.Pharma/B.Arch/B.Sc. Research/M.Sc./MA/MCA/ME/M.Tech/Dual Degree/Integrated Course
Final year students can also apply

importantDates.label: Last Date to Apply Without Late Fee
Last Date to Apply With Late Fee

applicationProcess.title: New Registration
applicationProcess.description: Create account on GATE Online Application Processing System (GOAPS)

applicationProcess.title: Fill Application
applicationProcess.description: Enter personal, educational, and exam details

applicationProcess.title: Upload Documents
applicationProcess.description: Upload photograph, signature, and eligibility documents

applicationProcess.title: Fee Payment
applicationProcess.description: Pay application fee online through debit/credit card, net banking, IMPS, or mobile wallet

courseDetails.structure: Multiple papers for different engineering disciplines

contact.address: GATE Office, IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi

title: IIM CAT 2025 Admission Online Form
overview: Common Admission Test for admission to MBA programs in IIMs and other business schools.
eligibility: Bachelor's degree with minimum 50% marks (45% for SC/ST/PWD)
Final year students can also apply
No age limit

applicationProcess.title: New Registration
applicationProcess.description: Create account on CAT official website

applicationProcess.title: Fill Application Form
applicationProcess.description: Enter personal, academic, and work experience details

applicationProcess.title: Select Programs
applicationProcess.description: Choose preferred IIMs and programs

applicationProcess.title: Fee Payment
applicationProcess.description: Pay application fee through online modes

courseDetails.structure: Three sections: Verbal Ability, DI/LR, Quantitative Aptitude

contact.address: CAT Office, IIM Bangalore, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore

title: CLAT 2026 Admission Online Form – Start
overview: Common Law Admission Test for undergraduate and postgraduate law programs in NLUs.
eligibility: For UG: 10+2 with 45% marks (40% for SC/ST)
For PG: LLB degree with 55% marks (50% for SC/ST)
Both passed and appearing candidates are eligible

applicationProcess.title: New Registration
applicationProcess.description: Create account on CLAT official website

applicationProcess.title: Fill Application
applicationProcess.description: Enter personal and educational details

applicationProcess.title: Upload Documents
applicationProcess.description: Upload photograph, signature, and category certificates

applicationProcess.title: Fee Payment
applicationProcess.description: Pay application fee online

selectionProcess: Seat allotment based on rank and preference

courseDetails.structure: UG: English, GK, Legal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, Quantitative Techniques
courseDetails.duration: 2 hours for UG, 2 hours for PG

contact.address: CLAT Office, NLSIU Campus, Nagarbhavi, Bangalore

title: UP B.Ed JEE Online Counseling 2025
fees: ₹1400 for General/OBC, ₹700 for SC/ST (without late fee); With Late Fee: ₹2000 for Gen/OBC, ₹1000 for SC/ST
overview: Online application for admission to B.Ed courses in Uttar Pradesh through UP B.Ed JEE 2025.
eligibility: Bachelor/Master Degree with minimum 50% marks (Engineering candidates 55%)
Minimum age: 15 years
Domicile not specifically required

applicationProcess.title: Online Registration
applicationProcess.description: Register on the UP B.Ed JEE application portal

applicationProcess.title: Document Upload
applicationProcess.description: Upload required documents including passport size photo, signature, and educational details

applicationProcess.title: Fee Payment
applicationProcess.description: Pay application fee online using net banking, credit/debit card, IMPS, or offline via E-Challan

applicationProcess.title: Admit Card & Exam
applicationProcess.description: Download admit card when released and appear for the exam

selectionProcess: Merit-based on UP B.Ed JEE 2025 score
Document verification at the time of admission
